entry.title: web3.py: Ethereum Interaction
entry.summary:
Description

In this session, we explore how to interact with the Ethereum blockchain using web3.py. We will cover the basics of web3.py, key use cases, and practical examples for Python developers interested in blockchain technology.

Sanghyeon Choi Hello! I am an active developer with a deep interest in â€¦
entry.content:
Description

In this session, we explore how to interact with the Ethereum blockchain using web3.py. We will cover the basics of web3.py, key use cases, and practical examples for Python developers interested in blockchain technology.

Sanghyeon Choi Hello! I am an active developer with a deep interest in blockchain and Ethereum. Currently, I am researching how Python can be used effectively in Web3 development. Nice to meet you!
